Start: I started my journey with one principle - to be a lifelong learner in any field that I am interested in at any given present.
Engineering_Graduate: My curiosity found satisfaction in acquainting myself with complex systems at least on paper. I did start building a few of my own and caught the coding bug.
Full_Stack_Developer: Started my journey through building frontend, ETL pipelines and then backend for financial data systems.
Master_Science: Another new domain, another opportunity and I dove into this giant dataverse headfirst.
ML_Engineer: My forray into building systems and pipelines for automated machine learning began.
ML_Ops: Automating ML Ops through a reliable, robust and explanable framework to make model validation as easy as clicking a few buttons.
